actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of reducing the interest rates on operating loans made after the effective date of this Act.
short_title: Farmers Home Administration Operating Loan Interest Rate Reduction Act

summary.text: Farmers Home Administration Operating Loan Interest Rate Reduction Act - Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to set a five percent maximum on the interest rate for operating loans. Exempts operating loan applicants age 18 to 35 from established farming experience eligibility requirements.

titles.title: Farmers Home Administration Operating Loan Interest Rate Reduction Act
A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of reducing the interest rates on operating loans made after the effective date of this Act.
